DOC.brief_title: The ERA Test Diagnostic Guide Personalized Embryo Transfer
DOC.detailed_description: This project seek investigate difference implantation ( IR ) , pregnancy ( PR ) , ongoing pregnancy ( OP ) rate delivery among woman undergo transfer blastocyst stage first IVF/ICSI cycle compare normal practice same-cycle embryo transfer fresh cycle ( ET ) versus defer embryo transfer ( DET ) versus personalize embryo transfer ( pET ) endometrial receptivity analysis ( ERA ) . A total 546 infertile woman 38 year old undergoing first IVF/ICSI cycle elective blastocyst transfer randomize prospective , multicenter , open label control trial . Patients allocate computer-generated randomization one three group : Fresh embryo transfer ( ET ) , Deferred embryo transfer ( DET ) personalize embryo transfer ( pET ) identification personalize window implantation use ERA test .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Patients indicate undergo cycle IVF/ICSI oocytes . 2 . Age ≤ 37 year 3 . BMI : 18.5 30 4 . Normal ovarian reserve ( AFC ≥ 8 ; FSH < 8 ) 5 . The appropriate stimulation protocol decide doctor . 6 . Blastocyst transfer ( day 5 6 ) 7 . Blastocyst vitrification open protocol ( Cryotop , Cryoleaf , Cryolock ) close protocol ( Cryotip CBSStraw . ) 8 . Any pathology affect endometrial cavity polyps/submucosal myoma , intramural myoma > 4 cm , hydrosalpinx affect endometrial cavity must previously operate . 1 . Patients repeat miscarriage ( > 2 previous biochemical pregnancy > 2 spontaneous miscarriage ) 2 . Patients severe male factor ( spermatozoa < 2 million/ml ) 3 . Patients implantation failure ( > 3 fail cycle good quality embryo )
